# SEQ14 Instructions

## Description
Sequence 14 focuses on transformation of work and learning

## Category
Towns

## Patterns
apl079, apl080, apl081, apl082, apl083, apl084, apl085, apl086, apl087, apl088, apl089

## Emergent Phenomena
Learning and work environments that are integrated into community life

## Overview
This sequence contains 11 pattern(s) that work together to create the emergent phenomena described above.
